Oct 22, 2021 Retired from Professional Basketball

Dec 19, 2020 Waived by Houston (HOU)

Nov 30, 2020 Signed a 1 year $2.56 million contract with Houston (HOU) - non-guaranteed

Feb 07, 2020 Waived by Denver (DEN)

Feb 05, 2020 Traded to Denver (DEN) from Houston (HOU) as part of a 4-team trade: Atlanta (ATL) traded 2024 2nd round pick to Houston (HOU); Atlanta (ATL) traded Evan Turner and 2020 1st round pick to Minnesota (MIN); Denver (DEN) traded Malik Beasley, Juan Hernangomez and Jarred Vanderbilt to Minnesota (MIN); Houston (HOU) traded Clint Capela and Nene Hilario to Atlanta (ATL); Houston (HOU) traded 2020 1st round pick to Denver (DEN); Minnesota (MIN) traded Keita Bates-Diop, Shabazz Napier and Noah Vonleh to Denver (DEN); Minnesota (MIN) traded Robert Covington and Jordan Bell to Houston (HOU)

Jul 22, 2019 Signed a 1 year contract with Houston (HOU)

Jul 09, 2018 Signed a 1 yr $2.4 million contract with Houston (HOU)

Mar 20, 2018 Fined $25,000 for fighting during HOU-MIN game

Mar 18, 2018 Fined $2,000 for ejection from HOU-MIN game

Jan 17, 2018 Suspended 2 games (forfeit $19,054) for “aggressively entering” the Clippers locker room

Dec 28, 2017 Signed a 1 year $1.38 million contract with Houston (HOU)

Oct 14, 2017 Waived by Milwaukee (MIL)

Sep 24, 2017 Signed a contract with Milwaukee (MIL)

Jul 13, 2017 Boston (BOS) renounced their free agent exception rights

Jul 27, 2016 Signed a 1 year $1.4 million contract with Boston (BOS)

Jul 10, 2016 Miami (MIA) renounced their free-agent exception rights

Nov 10, 2015 Suspended 2 games (forfeit $24,657) for conduct detrimental to the team

Oct 23, 2015 Fined $25,000 for menacing gestures during WAS-MIA preseason game

Jul 09, 2015 Phoenix (PHX) renounced their free-agent exception rights

Jul 09, 2015 Signed a 1 year $1.35 million contract with Miami (MIA)

Nov 15, 2014 Fined $2,000 for ejection from PHX-LAC game

Jul 27, 2013 Traded to Phoenix (PHX) from Indiana (IND) with Miles Plumlee and 2014 1st round pick [lottery protected] (#27 lottery protected) for Luis Scola and $1,121,520 Trade Player Exception

Jul 12, 2012 Signed a 3 year $10.5 million contract with Indiana (IND)

Mar 18, 2012 Signed a contract with New Jersey (NJN) for the remainder of the 2011-2012 season

Mar 08, 2012 Signed a 10-day contract with New Jersey (NJN)

Feb 27, 2012 Signed a 10-day contract with New Jersey (NJN)

Dec 22, 2011 Waived by Los Angeles (LAL)

Dec 13, 2011 Signed a contract with Los Angeles (LAL)

Jul 02, 2008 Signed a $854,957 contract with Dallas (DAL)

Mar 08, 2008 Waived by Houston (HOU)

Feb 21, 2008 Traded to Houston (HOU) from Minnesota (MIN) for Kirk Snyder and a 2010 2nd round draft pick

Jul 31, 2007 Traded to Minnesota (MIN) from Boston (BOS) with Ryan Gomes, Al Jefferson, Theo Ratliff, Sebastian Telfair, a 2009 1st round draft pick and a 2009 1st round draft pick for Kevin Garnett

Jul 06, 2006 Boston (BOS) exercised $1.44 million option for 2007-2008

Jul 03, 2005 Signed a 2 year $2.6 million contract with Boston (BOS)

Jun 28, 2005 Drafted by Boston (BOS): Round 1 (#18 overall)
